channel.title: Ebiten UI
channel.description: Ebiten UI is an extension to Ebitengine that provides the ability to render a complete user interface, with widgets such as buttons, lists, combo boxes, and so on. It uses the retained mode model. All graphics used by Ebiten UI can be fully customized, so you can really make your UI your own.

item.title: Basics
item.description: This guide will introduce you step by step to the basics of the library and teach you how to use all the main tools. Requirements Go 1.19+ Ebitengine 2.7.8+
